params.name: text_config
params.description: The config object of the text backbone.

params.name: mm_tokens_per_image
params.description: The number of tokens per image embedding.

params.name: boi_token_index
params.description: The begin-of-image token index to wrap the image prompt.

params.name: eoi_token_index
params.description: The end-of-image token index to wrap the image prompt.

params.name: image_token_index
params.description: The image token index to encode the image prompt.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.
